name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-adaptive-card-host-control
title: Adaptive Card Host control web part
shortDescription: This web part provides an example of how to use the AdaptiveCardHost component present in the PnP React Controls library.
longDescription: This web part provides an example of how to use the AdaptiveCardHost component present in the PnP React Controls library.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
